Welcome Covid 19 Response or Offer Chownow 10% OFF

All locations are currently open for carry-out and/or curbside carry-out and delivery (where available). Some locations have other dining options (see Location Updates). Check our location pages for hours of operation.We are doing everything in accordance with local, state and federal health officials to keep our employees and customers safe.

Thank you for continuing to support local businesses as much as possible.

drinks

Cocktails

$8

  • Classic Margaritta

    Tequila, triple sec, lemon-lime-orange juice. Jumbo on the rocks

  • Caipirinha

    Cachaca rum, lime

  • Guava Caipirinha

    Cachaca rum, lime, guava puree

  • Mango Martini

    Mango vodka, tanqueray, agave nectar, mango juice, and a tajin spiced rim

  • Pineapple Martini

    Pineapple vodka, coconut rum, pineapple juice

  • Mojito

    White rum, lime, mint (pineapple, blackberry, or strawberry syrup)

  • Cuba libre

    Rum, coke, fresh lime

  • Spiked horchata

    Rumchata, fireball whiskey, cinnamon sugar

  • Peruvian mule

    Vida mezcal, grand marnier, our house made sour mix, with a hint of smoke, salty/spicy rim

  • Jalapeño margarita

    Cazadores tequila, muddled jalapeño, grand marnierr, our house made sour mix, tajin spiced rim
